name: Multifactor Authentication Interrupted
description: Identifies user login with multifactor authentication failures, which might be an indication an attacker has the password for the account but can't pass the MFA challenge.
author: AlertIQ

detection.query:
selection_50074: {"ResultType": 50074, "ResultDescription|contains": "Strong Auth required"}
selection_500121: {"ResultType": 500121, "ResultDescription|contains": "Authentication failed during strong authentication request"}
